tool_description: Api's goal is analyzing given crypto token with 24 down, 25 up indicators (bullish bearish).
name: Crypto Trading Indicator Analysis
title: Crypto Trading Indicator Analysis

api_list.name: getPrediction
api_list.description:
This is the endpoint to get a prediction whether given token is bullish bearish or neutral with the price prediction for next candle. Price prediction is calculating with a correction value by using technical indicators. Please remind that this api's goal is not investment advice, it is only for quick information about exchanges.

exchange is the name of the exchange
If you want to check future's price then make isFuture to 1 otherwise make it 0 or don't send it
If you want to get only basic analysis you don't neet to send getAllData value or send it 0
Only this exchanges supported -> https://github.com/ccxt/ccxt#supported-cryptocurrency-exchange-markets

**Supported Intervals
**
1m : 1 minute
5m: 5 minutes
15m: 15 minutes
30m: 30 minutes
45m: 45 minutes
1h : 1 hour
2h : 2 hours
4h : 4 hours
1d : 1 day
1w : 1 week
1M : 1 month
